title: Intelligent Tutoring System Design and Domain Model Reusability Strategies

context.prior_knowledge: Requirement of intermediate theoretical background and practical experience
context.additional_context: A teaching competency enhancement program for pre-service or in-service teachers. Students design real ITS prototypes in team projects, develop domain model reuse strategies, and engage in practical sessions using digital devices.

learning_goals: Explain the core components of an intelligent tutoring system (domain model, instructional strategy, learner model)
Design a reuse strategy for applying analyzed existing domain models to other ITS platforms
Implement a science-domain ITS prototype in a team-based setting and write a project report

resources: ITS (Intelligent Tutoring System) Authoring Tool Software License
Science Domain Standardized Knowledge Base Sample

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
